body.p:
Berry Station Ky.
July 6th 1865
To his Excellency the Governor of Kentucky

Sir as there are a company of County Guards, to be raised for the County of harrison for the term of one or three Years and there are no person attempting to recruit and organize the same, by the Solicitation of many Soldiers and citizens of Said County I hereby ask permission to raise and organize Said Company. I can give references the best men we have. If there are any person acting in regard to this matter I do not know it I believe Sir that I can make the company Soon, and immediately goin to Camp.

Sir I have the honor
To be Your Obdt. Servt.
James H. Hargis
Clerk Co..C. 55th Ky. Infy vols.

Berry's Station, Harrison
July 6th, '65
Hargis, James H.
To Govenor.
Proposes to recruit a Co. for National Legion in Harrison County.
